breast_cancer.description: Detects potential breast cancer from histopathology images

covid19.description: Analyzes chest X-rays for COVID-19 and other lung conditions

malaria.description: Identifies malaria parasites in blood smear images

pneumonia.description: Detects pneumonia in chest X-ray images

skin_cancer.description: Classifies skin lesions as benign or malignant

tuberculosis.description: Screens chest X-rays for signs of tuberculosis
